title: Gross domestic product of the Arab world in 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows GDP in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Countrys.
The maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars 786.52 is found at Country Saudi Arabia and the minimum is found at Comoros where Country is 1.18.
The difference of GDP in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Country is 785.34.

max_summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Country, and GDP in billion U.S. dollars in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum GDP in billion U.S. dollars 786.52 is found at Country Saudi Arabia and the minimum is found at Comoros where Country is 1.18.
Country United Arab Emirates  has the second highest value for GDP in billion U.S. dollars.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars of Country Saudi Arabia is 666.54% larger than the minimum value at Comoros.
Country Saudi Arabia is higher than any other Countrys with value 786.52, followed by United Arab Emirates , and Egypt. Down to Country Comoros with the lowest value 1.18.
The Country Saudi Arabia tends to be 5.89 percent higher than average.
The GDP in billion U.S. dollars is 2672.26 if we add up values of all Countrys.
